sn55.30:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn55.30:1.2: Atha kho nandako licchavimahamatto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho nandakam licchavimahamattam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.30:2.1: “Catuhi kho, nandaka, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.30:2.3: Idha, nandaka, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.30:2.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.30:2.7: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.30:2.8: Imehi kho, nandaka, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.30:3.1: Imehi ca pana, nandaka, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako ayuna samyutto hoti dibbenapi manusenapi;
sn55.30:3.6: Tam kho panaham, nandaka, nannassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva vadami. Api ca yadeva maya samam natam samam dittham samam viditam, tadevaham vadami”ti.
sn55.30:4.1: Evam vutte, annataro puriso nandakam licchavimahamattam etadavoca:
